# shinychat

**shinychat** provides a [Shiny](https://shiny.posit.co/) toolkit for
building generative AI applications like chatbots and [streaming
content](https://posit-dev.github.io/shinychat/r/reference/markdown_stream.html).
It’s designed to work alongside the
[ellmer](https://ellmer.tidyverse.org/) package, which handles response
generation.

## Installation

You can install shinychat from CRAN with:

``` r
install.packages("shinychat")
```

Or, install the development version of shinychat from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("posit-dev/shinychat/pkg-r")
```

## Example

To run this example, you’ll first need to create an OpenAI API key, and
set it in your environment as `OPENAI_API_KEY`.

You’ll also need to install the [ellmer](https://ellmer.tidyverse.org/)
package (with `install.packages("ellmer")`).

``` r
library(shiny)
library(shinychat)

ui <- bslib::page_fillable(
  chat_ui(
    id = "chat",
    messages = "**Hello!** How can I help you today?"
  ),
  fillable_mobile = TRUE
)

server <- function(input, output, session) {
  chat <-
    ellmer::chat_openai(
      system_prompt = "Respond to the user as succinctly as possible."
    )

  observeEvent(input$chat_user_input, {
    stream <- chat$stream_async(input$chat_user_input)
    chat_append("chat", stream)
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)
```

# Package index

## Chat interfaces

- [`chat_ui()`](https://posit-dev.github.io/shinychat/r/reference/chat_ui.md)
  : Create a chat UI element
- [`chat_app()`](https://posit-dev.github.io/shinychat/r/reference/chat_app.md)
  [`chat_mod_ui()`](https://posit-dev.github.io/shinychat/r/reference/chat_app.md)
  [`chat_mod_server()`](https://posit-dev.github.io/shinychat/r/reference/chat_app.md)
  : Open a live chat application in the browser
- [`chat_append()`](https://posit-dev.github.io/shinychat/r/reference/chat_append.md)
  : Append an assistant response (or user message) to a chat control
- [`chat_append_message()`](https://posit-dev.github.io/shinychat/r/reference/chat_append_message.md)
  : Low-level function to append a message to a chat control
- [`chat_clear()`](https://posit-dev.github.io/shinychat/r/reference/chat_clear.md)
  : Clear all messages from a chat control
- [`update_chat_user_input()`](https://posit-dev.github.io/shinychat/r/reference/update_chat_user_input.md)
  : Update the user input of a chat control

## Streaming markdown interface

- [`markdown_stream()`](https://posit-dev.github.io/shinychat/r/reference/markdown_stream.md)
  : Stream markdown content
- [`output_markdown_stream()`](https://posit-dev.github.io/shinychat/r/reference/output_markdown_stream.md)
  : Create a UI element for a markdown stream.

## Bookmark chat history

- [`chat_restore()`](https://posit-dev.github.io/shinychat/r/reference/chat_restore.md)
  : Add Shiny bookmarking for shinychat

## Integration with ellmer

- [`contents_shinychat()`](https://posit-dev.github.io/shinychat/r/reference/contents_shinychat.md)
  : Format ellmer content for shinychat
